BLAdd36523.Transcription:
When wille ouer wyt wryesÞan goeth wille witte byfornMony a
                    man to his harme hyesÞan hath wille wit for lorn
BLAdd36523.Note: Written in the bottom margin of the previous text, 3107-8.
